inra.ijpb.data.image

Class FloatStackWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • inra.ijpb.data.image.FloatStackWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Image3D

    public class FloatStackWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Image3D
    Access the data of a 3D image containing intensity values stored as float.

    Example of use: 

    
	ImageStack stack = IJ.getImage().getStack();
	Image3D image = new FloatStackWrapper(stack);
	double val = image.getValue(0, 0, 0);
    Author:
    David Legland
    See Also:
    ByteStackWrapper, ShortStackWrapper
